sub_fields.label: Custom CSS Class
sub_fields.name: custom_css_class
sub_fields.instructions: This is not required, this is just for people who want to add more specific CSS styling.

sub_fields.label: Background Type
sub_fields.name: background_type
sub_fields.instructions: This changes what background color you want. This by default will just load a color automatically.

sub_fields.label: Hero Layout
sub_fields.name: hero_layout
sub_fields.instructions: This changes what layout you want. Full width will be one column, Side image will be two columns, & Custom Script allows for you to add scripts to a two column layout.

sub_fields.label: Number of Posts

sub_fields.instructions: Default value is 4, the minimum is 1 & the max is 12.
